column5: Went out for muskies today on Eagle.Great day for seeing muskies but not catching.Lol.Did have 2 on but they got off.Pike were everywhere.Made it done to Portage Bay and had a swim on the beach there.Ran back to the Vermilion Bay through Canoe Narrows. Can make it through but need to lift engine,not much water in there.Lake is way done and getting worse.Loaded boat up and took another dip at beach there.Lots of boats on the lake today and parking lot pretty busy.30c today with not much wind,but smoke has now moved back in.
Can't wait to do alittle swimming myself sept 11,that looks like one nice bath tub where the boats parked.
Pretty sweet place Rod.water temp 74 f there.Felt awesome. Iam afraid it won't be quite tgat warm in Sept.Guessing 60 f.Still not bad.lol.
All the fires might get keep the water warm for sept,doesn't really matter I go in regardless,as long as I don't have to break ice with my head when I do a triple axel off the dock.
Thanks for pictures. Hope that the rain forecast comes true. Looking forward to getting there next week. Take care
Good luck crossing the border.Hope it all goes smooth for everyone
